name: Product Feedback Survey
description: Comprehensive product feedback form with multiple question types

welcomeScreen.title: Product Feedback Survey
welcomeScreen.message: Help us improve by sharing your thoughts. This survey takes about 3 minutes.

questions.description: How satisfied are you with our product overall?
Which features do you use regularly?
How likely are you to recommend us to a colleague?
What improvements would you like to see?

endScreen.title: Thank You!
endScreen.message: Your feedback has been submitted successfully. We appreciate your time and input.
